"},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes">

"},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"\whitespace trim \define title-styles() fill:$(foregroundColor)$; \end
